item.title: This is full life cycle planning - great work Apple!
item.description:
This is full life cycle planning - great work Apple!

Marking Earth Day, Apple on Friday debuted a new TV commercial, using Siri to promote its custom-designed recycling robot - Liam - and its branding as an environmentally-responsible company. The 24-second spot shows Siri running on an iPhone held by a Liam unit.
